home.description: Dislayables provides a platform to easily build autonomous workstations to be used throughout our home, office or apartment buildings!

pageNotFound.missing: The page you are looking for doesn't exist or has been moved.

management.noMyPublic: You don't have any public workstations.
management.supportReply: Thank you for feedback! I probably won't reply.
management.supportMessage: If you have any problems or help please ask below and I will email you back!
management.supportNonEmpty: Please enter a non-empty title, email and body

errors.geolocation: Gathering the current location is not supported on your browser.
errors.ownership: You do not have permission to access this private workstation. If you are the owner of the workstation, make sure you are logged in.
errors.emptyUsernameAndPasswordLogin: Please enter a non-empty username and password.
errors.emptyUsernameAndPassword: Please enter a non-empty username, password and confirm password.

errors.loadImgSrc: Failed to load image source ðŸ˜¢

success.userCreated: User {{ user }} created! You can now login.

missing.name: Missing
missing.description: This position is free, drag a component here or click one of the component chips above. If you don't select a component, the partner component will expand into here.

position.name: Position
position.description: The placement the component will be placed

news.name: News
news.description: Provides a way of displaying the latest news based on a country and optional category.

country.name: Country
country.description: The country to provide the news about.

category.name: Category
category.description: The category of the news (required to be in english).

weather.name: Weather
weather.description: Provides a way of displaying the weather of a city and optional country code.

city.name: City
city.description: The city to gather the weather for.

code.name: Code
code.description: The optional country code to focus on a single country (due to many countries having the same city names).

countdown.name: Countdown
countdown.description: Provides a way of displaying a countdown, supporting a countdown to start and to end.

title.name: Title
title.description: The title or name of the countdown, e.g New Year.

start_date.name: Start Date
start_date.description: The starting date of the countdown.

end_date.name: End Date
end_date.description: The ending date of the countdown.

start_time.name: Start Time
start_time.description: The starting time of the countdown.

end_time.name: End Time
end_time.description: The ending time of the countdown.

location.name: Location
location.description: Provides a way of displaying a location on a map on the page.

zoom.name: Zoom
zoom.description: The Zoom number of how much to zoom into the map.

map.name: Map
map.description: The long and latitude of the current location, drag the marker to your selected location.

show_pointer.name: Show Pointer
show_pointer.description: Show the pointer on the loaded map.

video.name: Video
video.description: Provides a way of displaying a video on the page, with options for sound and endless playing.

videoSource.name: Video Source
videoSource.description: The source of the video location, this has to be a website.

videoLoop.name: Video Loop
videoLoop.description: If the video should loop endlessly or should just stop after a single run.

videoSound.name: Video Sound
videoSound.description: If the video sound should be played.

image.name: Image
image.description: Provides a way of displaying a image on the page based on the provided source.

imageSrc.name: Image Source
imageSrc.description: The source of the website, this has to be a website.
